sense.gloss: hilly section of a city (usu. upscale residential)
Yamanote (hilly residential section of western Tokyo, incl. Yotsuya, Aoyama, Koishikawa, Hongo, Ichigaya, Akasaka, Azabu and surrounds)

sdata.j: ↑山↑↓|やま↓の↑天気↑↓て|んき↓は↑変↑↓か↓わりやすいらしい。
sdata.e: It is said that the weather on the mountain changes easily.
